nodes.text: The planet Nevarro was located in a sector of the Outer Rim Territories. Though the planet had been a center for the Bounty Hunters' Guild and its operations, Magistrate Greef Karga and Marshal Carasynthia Dune worked to "clean up" Nevarro to make it respectable. Karga hoped it could become an anchor for the sector's trading operations once an Imperial base was destroyed. This base, which had been created during the Imperial expansion, was destroyed with the help of Mandalorian Din Djarin.
